A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I left feeling disappointed and let down for all the hype. This was no Empire. It wasn't absolutely terrible. The new and old characters are all still interesting and I enjoyed the acting. The pacing though the whole movie seemed off. I'm also not a huge fan of the comidy approach. I don't mind it from time to time it just seemed like to much for Star Wars. It answered a few questions but not the ones I actually wanted to know. The lightsaber battles left me wanting.  Snoke was also a huge let down. If it were any other movie it probably would have gotten a higher rating from me\, but I expect more from Star Wars. It all just felt empty at the end.
